Some squares with some unevenness, but easy to solve with chocks.
An impressive sunset and calm night with the waves of the sea in the background.

description: Cruceiro de Hio, the most beautiful in all of Galicia. This dirt parking lot is wide, in order to visit the monument, there is no restriction on sleeping.

title: (36945) Donón - 51 Rúa O Trigal
description: We spent the night in this beautiful place, there are 2 bars nearby, we had dinner in the upper one, beautiful views, we spent the night in one of the esplanades, both the upper and lower ones, there were people spending the night, we will honestly repeat.

title: (36313) Vigo - Camiño Área do Lecer
description: Pouso forest park. area with tables, barbecues, fountain, playground, hiking trails and mountain biking. very calm.

title: (36740) Tomiño - 8 Camiño do Alivio
description: Parking at center of Tomiño with shade (with limit of height) and without shade (without limit). Plain and with all services by side.

title: (36947) Cangas - 23 Rúa da Garita
description: Free parking next to the beach

title: (36940) Cangas - Rúa Gondomar
description: Parking without service.

title: (36947) Cangas - 1 Rúa Aldea de Arriba
description: wash 10Kg of laundry in 29' and dry in 16' near a car park and the beach.v

title: (36740) A Pedra -
description: Very calm. Ample parking. Tables and benches. River path. Bathing area

title: (36945) Donón - 1 Carretera Donon
description: Small esplanade at the entrance of Donón, since AC access is not allowed in the Parking area. Holds up to 2 AC. There is no type of service, only to park. We did not spend the night just in case, moderately stable.

title: (36947) Cangas - 16 Lugar Reboredo
description: Exclusive marked parking for motorhomes. More or less 10 places. It lacks services although there is a garbage container in the vicinity. It is a high point above Cangas and you can see the Ria de Vigo a bit. Next to a supermarket. Five minutes walk to the old town of Cangas.

title: (36945) Vilariño - 49 Rúa Estrada de Bueu
description: Laundry at the foot of the road, no loss. There are small washing machines and dryer. Very economical.

title: (36205) Vigo - 14 Avenida de Emilio Martínez Garrido
title_short: (36205) Vigo - 14 Avenida de Emilio Martínez Garrido
description: Lacolada Martínez Garrido self-service laundry. It has 3 washing machines and 2 dryers, as well as a machine for changing banknotes to coins. Next to a square and cafeteria.

title: (36945) O Igrexario - 313 Lugar Iglesario
description: Beach view

title: (36945) O Hio - Cangas Do Morrazo - Avenida Union S/N
title_short: (36945) O Hio - Cangas Do Morrazo - Avenida Union S/N
description: Camper car area playa arneles, is located in a beautiful place where you can enjoy beautiful views of the ria de aldan, and enjoy a beautiful beach just two minutes walk from the motorhome and caravan camp.

title: (36949) Cangas - Rúa do Balcón do Rei
title_short: (36949) Cangas - Rúa do Balcón do Rei
description:
Area with many tables with lots of shade. Ample parking to stop to eat or rest. A little abandoned, but acceptable. There are barbecues. The access is complicated because the Maps tries to get you through forest roads, there is a paved track with some slope and 2 signs but they are erased.
Edit: The best thing is to go up where it is indicated towards a school, the access is right in front.

title: (36712) Tui - 159 PO-3001
description: Nice little place in peace, just next door you can take the path that goes down for 100m and you are right at the edge of the stream.

title: (36313) O Pouso - Av. do Rebullón
description: Well-leveled dirt parking next to a recreational area with tables and barbecue. There is a bar, garbage cans and swings. There are streetlights where the tables are. The water fountains do not work as of August 25, 2023. A little noisy due to the highway that passes relatively nearby.

title: (36416) - s/n Avenida do Rebullón
description: Bembrive Forest Park. Area with tables, barbecues and children's play area. Views of the Cíes Islands. Very quiet place. Sandwich bar on site.

title: (36945) San Cibrán - 104 Lugar San Cibran
description: Parking next to a park overlooking the beach. nice walk. we had a very quiet night.

title: (36711) Tui - 5 Lugar Gayos
description: Bargaoil gas station, lovely Vanessa lets us throw gray ones in the black car washes in the toilets, leaving them clean as they were and get clean water, she also lets us sleep at the gas station

title: (36416) - 23 Avenida do Rebullón
description: Tameiga Park Parking. With picnic tables and barbecues, next to the Bembrive picnic area and a motorhome area that also has a toilet.

title: (36416) Tameiga - Avenida do Rebullón 23
description: ACCESS From the AP-9, take exit 159 if you are coming from Bayona, or 159-B and then the 8 Puxeiros if you are coming from Peinador, continue and once at the Alto de Puxeiros roundabout turn right west towards Rebullón and continue to As Center Pedriñas, where the area is located. If you are on the N-120, take exit 8 if coming from Vigo, or 9 if coming from Porriño, to the Alto de Puxeiros roundabout. COMMENTS Maximum stay of 72 hours. INTERESTING Privileged setting with swimming pool, cafeteria with daily menu, sports fields and barbecues. Forest park nearby. A petrol station is 2 km away. Bus stop for Vigo at 1km. All services in the urban area, about 400 m. Hiking routes, viewpoints towards Vigo and towards the Louriña Valley.

title: (36711) Tui - 7 Estrada de Anta
description: CC service area adjacent to the discount service station.

title: (36712) Tui - A-55
description: Playground and picnic areas next to the parking area. On the outskirts of Tui. Water fountain. There is a taperia right in front. Ideal to go with children.

title: (36945) Vilanova -
description: Place in the middle of nature, in its strictest description. a few picnic tables and a flat and empty grassy field, allows the parking of 2 to be comfortable or 3 vans. the access road is not paved and it is easier coming from Donón. I advise against arriving via Vilanova. going down was already an ordeal. the spot was clean when we left it would be nice if it stayed that way.

title: (36945) San Cibrán - 25 Rúa Estrada de Bueu
title_short: (36945) San Cibrán - 25 Rúa Estrada de Bueu
description: Road parking in the shade. Warning! very bad exit, no 30 cm at the exit, cautious motorhomes

name: Camping HIO
title: (36945) Camping HIO
description: Camping HIO. In plots has electricity and Wifi. For the convenience of the campers, drinking water taps are distributed throughout the facilities, as well as fire extinguishers and selective collection containers.

title: (36770) O Rosal - Camiño As Covas
description: Small parking lot to start a beautiful route through some mills next to the river. WC and fountain. You can spend the night. Very calm

title: (36945) Cangas - 19 Desconocido
description: Day parking only! prepayment in a private estate, next to San Xián beach, which has two beach bars. More service. NARROW ACCESS!!! L2H2, no problem.

title: (36410) O Porriño - 2 Rúa B
description: Area with easy parking. It has a self-service laundry with special washing machines for washing pets, a supermarket, a bakery with very good quality products, a couple of cafeterias and a small playground

title: (36700) Tui - 34 Rúa O Pilar
description: LAUNDRY

title: (36700) Tuy - 2A Prolongación Alcalde Casal Aboy
description: Solar used as parking, also close to the health center, there are two others closer, this seemed the quietest / safest and suitable for our trailer .

name: Camping Tirán
title: (36958) Camping Tirán
description: Camping Tiran in Moaña

title: (36700) Tui - 4 Rúa Ourense
description: Free parking, quiet and many places

title: (36700) Tuy - 1 O Rollo
description: Esplanade and wide and free streets. Useful when the municipal parking lot is too full to maneuver.

title: (36207) Vigo - 16 Avenida Guixar
description: Ideal parking to leave the AC and visit the center of Vigo. Close to the train track but at night they do not circulate. Old town at 2 kms.

title: (36214) Vigo - 41H Rúa Barreiro
description: Mixed municipal parking without restrictions, shaded during the day, all shops nearby.

title: (36206) Vigo - 217 Camino Gonderan
description: Gonderan Street. 100 meters down the pedestrian street is C. Comercial Travesía, (Carrefour). Ideal for spending the night on the weekend since there is a school during the week. Water source 150 meters, beaches 15 minutes, Path "Ruta del Agua" 200 meters. Bakeries, laundries, gas stations in the area.

name: Camping Aldán
title: (36945) Camping Aldán
description: Camping Aldan. They admit AC with emptying and filling area included in the price. There are pitches with shade and sun and they are grass. The entrances inside the campsite are somewhat narrow for AC but accessible. Admissions are from 3:00 p.m. and departures before 12:00 p.m. It has a common laundry area, toilets, showers and sinks. There is a bar (not open all day) and a playground. Beach 7min walk and supermarket 10 min. CARDS NOT ALLOWED !!!

title: (36791) Pontevedra - 22A Lugar O Monte
description: Public fountain to catch water. It parks well next to it.

title: (36730) Tomino - 25 Lugar O Ramo
description: Very quiet place, on the bank of the river. There is a cobblestone base to park 3 motorhomes and a ramp to lower boats to the river. It also has a bar-restaurant 500 m away where you can eat very well.

name: Área de autocaravanas Tui
title: (36700) Área de autocaravanas Tui
description: Motorhome parking for a maximum of 3 vehicles. Water available on site, disposal possible via a hole in the ground. It is approx. 500 meters to the village. It is a place of pilgrimage with corresponding prices, but worth seeing. Access maximum 3.5 tons.

name: Aneli Sertuy
title: (36720) Aneli Sertuy
description: Gas station with free shower. Very nice staff. We took a shower and filled up the fuel afterwards (also cheap)

title: (36945) Pinténs - 18 Lugar Vilanova
description: Small parking lot at the end of the street with direct access to the beach and sea views. Very small for a maximum of two cars. Entrance very uneven but we were able to stand in the middle.

title: (36700) Tui - 22A Rúa Canónigo Valiño
description: Very quiet free parking 800 meters from tui cathedral, without services

title: (36770) Portecelo - 2 Lugar Portecelo
description: Freshly created small park around the pilgrims' café at a viewpoint. The old gravel car park no longer exists. There are five wide parking spaces, large enough for motorhomes, but sloping. Illuminated at night, close to residential houses. A peaceful place at night, during the day there're certainly many pilgrims on the Camino. Excellent sea view and playground for children.

title: (36207) Vigo - 131 Rúa Campana
description: Self-service laundry from 8:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. 365 days a year. Avenida Sanjurjo Badía num. 181

title: (36700) Tui - 15 Rúa Barca
description:
Several areas with parking and views of the river Miño.
Good place to spend the day with the family, children's area, walks along the river.
Very quiet to sleep.

title: (36400) O Porriño - 2 Rua Paralela 1
description: Service area with showers for a fee. The girl who took care of me was very friendly and helpful.

title: (4930) - Ecopista
description: Large car park right next to the river and where you can start a cycle path by the ecopist. We stayed here one night and it happened to be a very quiet location as there was no traffic. There are trash cans near the park and recreation area. Clean toilets, there is a water point available, a bar, picnic tables, games for children, barbecues etc...

title: (36400) O Porriño - Calle Tras dos Fornos
title_short: (36400) O Porriño - Calle Tras dos Fornos
description:
Porriño does not have much to visit. Large plot of land, 5 minutes from downtown walking.
crossing the train track through the tunnel there is a path along the Louro river. Many places to eat, we ate at Bar Celtiña less than 500m. On Tuesday you have to be careful there is a street market and the townspeople fill the parking lot (it's morning).
On July 11 and the last two of September are local parties and this parking is used to put the odds and ends.

title: (36400) Porriño - 16 Avenida Buenos Aires
description: New self-service laundry and dryer. Wifi with a good connection.

title: (36318) Vigo - 183 Rúa da Becerreira
description: Quiet natural park throughout the day where you can rest safely, in summer it is cool because the trees give a lot of shade. It has no services but there is a gas station a few meters away with a cafeteria (closed on weekends) and bathrooms.

name: Camping Francón
title: (36945) Camping Francón
description: Camping Francón

title: (36207) Vigo - Avd de la Marina Española 1
title_short: (36207) Vigo - Avd de la Marina Española 1
description: Parking for motorhomes, (maximum 24 hours) Winter hours from 9:30 a.m. to 8 p.m. Summer hours from 9 a.m. to 10 p.m. Water service (ONLY FOR CUSTOMERS). 2.5km from the center. Bus stop 50m away, and health center, pharmacy and 5 different supermarkets 200m away. Entrance to the highway and small beach 300 m away. Entry can be personal or assisted (call to enter). Check-in when entering, check-out when leaving. THERE ARE NO BATHROOMS.

title: (36940) Cangas - PK 15 PO-551
description: Cepsa gas station, with a tap to fill the water tank.

title: (4920) Campos - 8 Avenida 1 de Janeiro
description: Parking at the football stadium. Almost no traffic.

title: (4930) Valença - EM1046
description: Perfect place to leave your RV while visiting the fortress of Valença do Minho (12 Century). If one wishes to stay overnight... no problem at all, local Police station is in front and usualy they don’t implícate with us.

title: (4930) Valença - Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
title_short: (4930) Valença - Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
description: Although next to the walls of Valencia there is a lot of parking for tourists, this one has the advantage of not being dirt but cobblestone, very used by buses. quiet and very close to the Puerta do Sol, has no services.

address.street: Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra

title: (36945) Menduiña - 72 Rúa Baixada á Praia de Menduíña
title_short: (36945) Menduiña - 72 Rúa Baixada á Praia de Menduíña
description: Parking. During the day it is full of people, some fishermen come to fish and everything is very quiet.

address.street: 72 Rúa Baixada á Praia de Menduíña

title: (36207) Vigo - 39 Travesía Espiñeiro 1
description: Free parking open 24 hours. Spectacular view. There are several water sources to load with drums. There are no drains. I do not know if you can spend the night or not, I do not care about spending a few days. There is a beach

title: (4930-678) Valença - 1867 Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
title_short: (4930-678) Valença - 1867 Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
description: Near fortress Valença

address.street: 1867 Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra

title: (36791) - Unnamed Road
description: Port of Rio Miñio fishermen, equipped with picnic table, barbecue, water point. Beware of floods, it is better to stay a little higher. Night without worry, very calm. No service.

name: Area Recreativa Caravanas da Lenta
title: (4920) Area Recreativa Caravanas da Lenta
description: Lovelhe river beach. Nice place to spend the day, picnic and swim. There is a bathroom and cold showers. The Center of Vilanova de Cerveira is 2 minutes away.

title: (4930) Valença - 6 Avenida de Espanha
description: Ground parking.

title: (4930) Valença - 982 Avenida Pinto da Mota
description:
Parking de tierra bastante plano,sin limitación de altura y fácilmente maniobrable para vehículos grandes cercano a la fortaleza.
lugar muy tranquilo donde pasar la noche cercano al casco urbano

title: (36954) Cangas - Camiño do Monte da Pena
title_short: (36954) Cangas - Camiño do Monte da Pena
description: Recreation area with tables and benches, nice views

title: (4920) Vila Meã - Unnamed Road
description: Gas bottle exchange (Falcão Gomez Gás): We exchanged our Campingaz 904 bottle here. They also have other models from Campingaz :)

title: (4930-596) Valença - 13 Rua 25 de Abril
description: Stationary on very quiet place and near the fortress

title: (4930) Cristêlo Côvo - IP1
description: Ample ground parking, next to the Wednesday market. Flat. Without services.

title: (36475) - 52 Lugar Vacaria
description: Ample parking at the As Fornas Cultural Center. Super friendly owner, homemade food, spectacular treatment. Not being an area here, man offers you waters. We have spent two super quiet nights, free parking, hiking trails from the parking lot, soccer field, playground, radio controlled car track, highly recommended place.

title: (36317) Vigo - 3F Subida á Madroa
description: Zoo parking lot, quiet with picnic tables, small kiosk café and beautiful viewpoint over the Ría de Vigo.

title: (36750) - 8 Avenida Pío Troncoso
description:
8 places conditioned by the Tomiño town hall. Close to supermarkets and an area of
 playtime.

title: (4930-678) Valença - 9 Avenida Miguel Dantas
description: Park for those traveling with a quiet night, plenty of space to visit Valença, go shopping and eat a good cod. No service for children.

title: (4930-655) Valença - 25 Rua dos Seixos
description: Quiet and pleasant place with playground and leisure park. Close to the historic area and the Minho bike path.
